name: Alpona
author: Mazharul

sections.description:
This plugin will allow to create card to show info. The plugin only adds one widget on the Elementor page builder.

Requirements

Alpona Works as an extension of the Elementor Page builder. The main and core requirement is to activate the Elementor Page Builder plugin.
sections.installation: 1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Allows to create card on a page to display the information on your site.
